alert.note: Alert for Morgan County; Northeast Weld County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 2:15PM MST until January 19 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Patchy freezing drizzle transitioning to light snow will lead to continued slick conditions on roadways. Up to a half inch of additional snow accumulation possible. * WHERE...Briggsdale, Fort Morgan, and Akron. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Icy road conditions are expected to continue into the evening commute, making travel very difficult. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination. Sidewalks may be icy and very slippery. Walk on grassy areas or avoid sidewalks if icy.

area.areaDesc: Morgan County; Northeast Weld County; Washington County
